com.jmr.wrapper.common.listener

Interface SocketListener


  • public interface SocketListener
    Networking Library SocketListener.java Purpose: Interface that lays out the framework for listeners attached to either the Server or Client.
    Version:
    1.0 7/19/2014
    Author:
    Jon R (Baseball435)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connected(Connection con)
      Called when a new client connects.
      void disconnected(Connection con)
      Called when a client disconnects.
      void received(Connection con, java.lang.Object object)
      Called when a new packet arrives.

    • Method Detail

      • received

        void received(Connection con,
              java.lang.Object object)
        Called when a new packet arrives.
        Parameters:
        con - The connection the object came from.
        object - The object that was sent.

      • connected

        void connected(Connection con)
        Called when a new client connects.
        Parameters:
        con - The connection of the new client.

      • disconnected

        void disconnected(Connection con)
        Called when a client disconnects.
        Parameters:
        con - The connection of the client.
